thread.title: Ground News - Cotswolds quad bike crash victim named as Grace Vater
thread.title_full: Ground News - Cotswolds quad bike crash victim named as Grace Vater

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Cotswolds quad bike crash victim named as Grace Vater
text:
Summary by Ground News Two men, aged 29 and 30, have been arrested in connection with the incident. Police have appealed for anyone who saw the incident to get in touch. The victim has been named locally as a 22-year-old woman from Gloucestershire. Her family have paid tribute to her as a "beautiful, kind and loving woman" Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Sky News UK Center High Factuality Individual: Roberts Family Cotswolds quad bike crash victim named as Grace Vater In a tribute, the family of 22-year-old Grace Vater called her "a treasured and much-loved daughter, sister, granddaughter and aunty", with a "huge love for animals" and who was "beautiful inside and out".
